name: inventory-management-system
description: Web-Based Inventory Management System - Internal Administrative Panel & Customer Web Portal

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../customer && npm install
scripts.setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run seed
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n backend,staff,customer -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:staff" "npm run dev:customer"
